title.rendered: Gulshan Botnia – a perfect place to live

content.rendered:
Home is where the heart is – Pliny the Elder
The concept of owning a dream home doesn’t just encapsulate the idea of having a physical structure that you can call your own. Not a lot of people talk about the emotional attachment they have with their homes. So it is not just a physical space with all the amenities, it is a dream haven that is inhabited by your loved ones. A dwelling where you celebrate every moment and make unforgettable memories. A home typically has to accommodate not just your furniture but also the present and future needs of your entire family. Finding a home that fits this description is improbable. But even a close match can help you live an almost perfect life, with the people you love.
Finding a home in a residential project that epitomizes luxury, grandeur, and everything in between can take months, if not years. The closest you can come to perfection is by buying a house in Gulshan Botnia, a high-end residential living project by one of the most reputable builders in Delhi NCR – Gulshan. Gulshan Botnia doesn’t just have cozy and comfortable homes but an environment that embraces the modern lifestyle to its core. Whether you talk about in terms of design, location, or amenities, Gulshan Botnia beats the benchmarks and sets its own. And you get the customary guarantee of quality construction that we have all come to expect from Gulshan. Let us now delve a little deeper into what makes Gulshan Botnia the ideal address for your dream home.
We won’t go by the standard definition of what comprises basic amenities in residential housing projects. Because Gulshan has time and again outdone itself when it comes to amenities. It’s no different with Gulshan Botnia. The usual suspects are all there, with nuanced changes of course. Amenities are always the same, it’s how you present them. What separates Gulshan Botnia or for that matter any other project under the umbrella of Gulshan, is how smaller details are paid attention to. So there are plenty of lush greens inside Gulshan Botnia, like all their projects. It’s just a pleasure being amidst greens – waking up to beautiful natural views – taking a walk breathing fresh air – or just overlooking the natural grandeur from the balcony – nothing can beat this experience.
Now we have all heard that spacious homes garner more attention than those compact spaces that could do with some space extension. However, if the interior design of rooms and other areas inside your home doesn’t inspire you, what are you going to do with all that space anyway. Furnishings always make homes look better. It is just about striking the right balance between space and functionality. Gulshan Botnia does that with a high degree of perfection. You will fall in love with every wall and corner of your home.
Gulshan Botnia is well-equipped in terms of practical features as well. And if you know that power outages are common in Noida, you need to make sure that you invest in a property that comes with a 24/7 power pack-up. If you are living in a high-rise society that doesn’t have power-back-up, you will have to walk up the stairs because the elevator won’t be working. Even if you have an inverter at home, you will still have poor-lit common areas throughout the society. Gulshan Botnia has a power backup facility so if there are power outages, you wouldn’t even know. Another perk of living in a high-end residential apartment.
Gulshan area also has a children’s play area to keep your little ones busy. When you are buying a house, you have to make sure that you consider the needs of the entire family. Living in a society that doesn’t have a dedicated playing area for kids will affect their physical, mental, emotional, and social well-being. It is especially important for working parents to ensure that they keep their kids’ engagement and overall development in mind when they are looking out for a house. Gulshan understands this concern and thus it has built a separate play area for children, which also has small rides for their enjoyment.
One of the most important reasons people want to live in a residential society is the assurance of security of their property and belongings as well as the safety of their loved ones. While almost every society these days has some kind of security in place, it is important to ensure that you buy a home in a society that’s manned by security personnel and has an advanced digital security system in place. Gulshan Botnia fits the bill. No unauthorized person or parcel can enter the society premises without them being properly frisked. All the common areas are under CCTV surveillance. So you can rest assured that your home and its residents are always safe and secure.
The location, they say is the most important thing that buyers consider when buying a house. We are acknowledging it so late in the piece because the location of Gulshan Botnia is one of the most desirable locations not only in Delhi NCR but entire North India. Noida Golf Course, Wave City Center, Pari Chowk, DND Flyover, and Kalindi Kunj are all less than a 30-minute drive from the housing society. There are schools, markets, and hospitals nearby. So all your basic needs will be easily met without any unnecessary time wastage.
Gulshan Botnia also has an open badminton court, AC gymnasium, and swimming pool to accommodate the needs of people who follow an active lifestyle and are conscious about their health and fitness. Other amenities include rainwater harvesting, a beauty salon, and many more. So if you are searching for a home, don’t forget to pay Gulshan Botnia a visit.
